title: QMS Document Rendition and Checkout Visibility

comment: COMPLIANT. Verified: (1) Frontmatter title='QMS Document Rendition and Checkout Visibility', revision_summary='Initial draft' (acceptable for v0.1 per SOP-001 Section 5.1). (2) All required sections per SOP-002 Section 6 are present and complete: Purpose, Scope (with Context, Changes Summary, Files Affected), Current State, Proposed State, Change Description, Justification, Impact Assessment, Testing Summary, Implementation Plan, Execution, Execution Summary, References. (3) No placeholder content in pre-approved sections. (4) No typos or formatting errors found. (5) Technical scope limited to QMS CLI code (.claude/qms.py, .claude/qms_meta.py) - no TU assignment required. RECOMMEND for approval.

POST-REVIEW COMPLETE.
